name: Nowadays
headline: AI co-pilot for corporate event planning
description: Nowadays is an AI copilot that automates the boring parts of planning corporate events. For example, our AI can contact venues by email and phone to get availability, deal with back-and-forth negotiations, and present the best options.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:b2b; industry:logistics; industry:marketing; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Anna Sun, Founder
founders.description: CEO at Nowadays. Previously PM & SWE at Datadog, DoorDash, and Amazon. Studied Computer Science and graduated from MIT.

founders.name: Amy Yan, Founder
founders.description: COO at Nowadays. Formerly worked in strategy & operations roles at Google, Meta, and McKinsey & Company.

generated_description:
**Nowadays: Redefining Corporate Event Planning with AI**

Founded in 2023 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Nowadays is an innovative startup based in San Francisco that aims to streamline corporate event planning. With just a small but dedicated team of three, the company is driven by a mission: to be the AI co-pilot that takes the drudgery out of organizing corporate events.

At its core, Nowadays uses artificial intelligence to automate the tedious tasks associated with event planning. This includes reaching out to venues through email and phone, handling negotiations, and ultimately presenting the best options tailored to the client’s needs. It’s not just about saving time; it’s about enhancing the experience of planning events—allowing corporate teams to focus on the creative and strategic aspects instead.

The technology operates as an IATA-certified AI travel agency, giving them an edge in negotiating venue prices and securing optimal arrangements. This means clients save money while still enjoying top-notch services. Nowadays employs fast response times and has a wide reach for venue searches, ensuring that users get results that align with their criteria.

Among the innovative companies already benefiting from Nowadays' AI-powered services are industry giants like Google, Amazon, and Notion, showcasing the platform's effectiveness across the corporate sector.

For those looking to simplify their event planning process, Nowadays positions itself as an in-house event planner that adapts to unique company tastes and requirements. From venue selection to logistics, their intelligent systems take the hassle out of event management.

If you’re intrigued by the potential of AI to revolutionize corporate planning, you can check out their offerings at [getnowadays.com](http://getnowadays.com/).

In summary, Nowadays is not just a product; it’s a paradigm shift in the way corporate events are conceived and executed. With the power of AI at its helm, event planning may never again be the same.
